companyDescription: Better Security Through Integration and Automation.
description:
About the job
            

                  
      
    

  
      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn More
  

            
                
                  We're looking for a Full Stack Developer who thrives on building end-to-end solutions that bring data and workflows together. In this role, you'll design and implement integrations between leading security platforms, powering seamless data ingest pipelines and automated response systemsYou'll work across the stack from backend services and APIs to user-facing features, making complex cybersecurity ecosystems more connected and effective.Requirements      Strong programming experience (TypeScript/JavaScript or Python preferred, but not required).Ability to design and implement backend services, APIs, and data pipelines.Experience building user-facing features with modern frontend frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue).Strong debugging and problem-solving skills across the stack.Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure).Comfort working in Agile teams (sprints, design discussions, user stories).Awareness of security best practices for both backend and frontend development.
Bonus Points If You      Have built integrations with enterprise systems or security platforms.Know testing frameworks like Jest, Cypress, or PyTest.Have experience with Docker and Kubernetes.Have deployed scalable applications in the cloud.Contribute to open-source projects or enjoy sharing technical insights publicly.
This job was posted by Chanchal Kale from Metron Security.
                
                
                Desired Skills and Experience
                
                  C++,CI - CD,Golang,JavaScript,Python,React.js,Vue.js

title: Software Developer - Remote USASoftware Developer - Remote USA
companyDescription: Braintrust is revolutionizing hiring with Braintrust AIR, the world's first and only end-to-end AI recruiting platform.
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Job DescriptionThis role is remote but will be required to visit the office in Birmingham, Michigan (Detroit, MI area) on a per need basis.Role Description:We are looking for a versatile Software Developer with a blend of legacy and modern technical expertise. The ideal candidate is comfortable working with older technologies such as classic ASP, while also bringing proficiency in modern development tools and environments. The role involves analyzing legacy codebases, contributing to web development projects, and supporting cloud and container-based deployments.Responsibilities:      Analyze and reverse engineer existing classic ASP applications.Write and optimize SQL queries for MS SQL Server databases.Collaborate on front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Support systems running on Linux, including basic scripting and troubleshooting.Leverage modern tools like Git, Node.js, AWS, and Docker to develop and deploy applications.
Requirements:      Experience with classic ASP or a willingness to learn and work with legacy systems.Strong skills in SQL and experience with MS SQL Server.Proficiency in front-end technologies including web design, CSS, and JavaScript.Basic experience with Linux operating systems.Familiarity with modern development tools including Git, Node.js, AWS, and Docker.Strong analytical skills and the ability to understand and refactor legacy codebases.

description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Position DescriptionAt CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company - one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve. At CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company - one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve results for our clients - and for our members. Come grow with us. Learn more at www.cgi.com.This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for full-time, permanent members start on the first day of employment and include a paid time-off program and profit participation and stock purchase plans. We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position, however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted. No unsolicited agency referrals please.Job Title: Python Full Stack DeveloperPosition: Software Engineer / Senior Software EngineerExperience: 2- 4YearsCategory: Software Development/ EngineeringMain location: India, Bangalore /Hyderabad / ChennaiPosition ID: J1125-1896Employment Type: Full TimeYour future duties and responsibilitiesTo Develop and maintain React JS, Python-based applicationsExperience with AWS platformContribute to the design and architecture of new features and enhancements in Java.Document development processes, code changes, and other relevant information.Proven problem solving, communication, interpersonal and analytical skills. .Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and writing optimized SQL queries.Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment tools like Jenkins, GitLabKnowledge on Agile Methodology and DEVOPS.Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This RoleSkills : 2 years of Experience in React JS, PythonLocation : Bangalore / Chennai / HyderabadEducation : BE / B.Tech / MCA / BCATogether, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Full Stack EngineerFull Stack Engineer
postedAt:

description:
About the job
            

                  
      
    

  
      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn More
  

            
                
                  We are looking for a passionate Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in React (frontend) and Node.js or Python (backend), along with a strong foundation in AWS cloud services. The ideal candidate will be responsible for building scalable, high-performance web applications and APIs that power critical business functions.Responsibilities      Design, develop, and maintain end-to-end web applications using React and Node.js/Python.Build and integrate RESTful and GraphQL APIs for frontend-backend communication.Develop reusable UI components and ensure responsive, intuitive interfaces.Work with AWS services such as Lambda, API Gateway, S3, DynamoDB, ECS/EKS, CloudFormation, and RDS.Implement CI/CD pipelines (CodePipeline, Jenkins, or GitHub Actions).Optimize application performance, scalability, and reliability.Collaborate with DevOps, Data, and Product teams to define and deliver solutions.Write clean, testable, and maintainable code with good documentation.Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and architecture discussions.
Requirements      Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
Frontend      React.js, Redux / Context API, React Hooks.TypeScript or JavaScript (ES6+).HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind / Material UI.Webpack / Vite.
Backend (any One Or Both)      Node.js (Express / NestJS).Python (FastAPI / Flask / Django).RESTful API design, Authentication (OAuth2/JWT).
Database      SQL (PostgreSQL / MySQL).NoSQL (MongoDB / DynamoDB).
Cloud And DevOps      AWS (S3, Lambda, EC2, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation).Docker and containerization.CI/CD (AWS CodePipeline / Jenkins / GitHub Actions).
Others      Git, Bitbucket, or GitHub.Unit and integration testing (Jest / PyTest / Mocha / Cypress).Familiarity with microservices and event-driven architecture.
Good To Have      Experience with Serverless applications (AWS Lambda + API Gateway).Exposure to AI/ML APIs or Generative AI integration.Knowledge of Terraform or AWS CDK.Familiarity with Agile methodologies (Scrum / Kanban).
This job was posted by Chetna Joshi from UsefulBI.
                
                
                Desired Skills and Experience
                
                  AWS,Angular,Express.js,JavaScript,MongoDB,Node.js,Python,React.js
